channel.title: Dedi
channel.description: Hi, I have been attempting to get my server on a dedi for days. Even the support staff cannot help me... They say they have no requirement to help with the program, only the hardway. Anyways, I was wondering if any of you could explain to me or send me a link with an explenation of how to get the server on a dedi. Thanks.

item.title: Dedi
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

heres a quote from 'Rich i found on it.
[hr]

Zip your server files, upload them onto a website, download it on your VPS, then use the delete link to remove it from the website. Unzip it once it’s finished downloading, and do the following;

Edit your compiler to this;

Code: @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Now, edit your run to this;

Code: @echo off title Runserver "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx1500m server pause
Have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Dedi
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Then how about you explain more of the problem.

Tell use what happens when you try to run it… What does it do? What does it say?

More than likely it’s a Java related issue such as not having JRE.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

Could anyone explain it to me? rather than just giving me tips please? because by saying ‘you need java on it’ Doesn’t sound asif you understand what i am asking.
